Package org.jlab.phaser.network

package org.jlab.phaser.network
Provides the Phaser Swing Client network classes.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.jlab.phaser
    Provides the core Phaser Swing Client classes.
    org.jlab.phaser.db
    Provides the database access classes.
    org.jlab.phaser.exception
    Provides the Phaser Swing Client exception classes.
    org.jlab.phaser.export
    Provides the classes for exporting data.
    org.jlab.phaser.model
    Provides the Phaser Swing Client object model classes.
    org.jlab.phaser.swing
    Provides the core Phaser Swing Client Swing GUI classes.
  • Class
    Description
    JsonDecoder
    Responsible for decoding JSON messages from a Netty Channel.
    NettyJsonConsole
    An implementation of a PhaserServerConsole which leverages the Netty network library to do the heavy lifting.
    PhaserClientMessageDecoder
    Responsible for decoding JSON messages per the Phaser Client-Server protocol.
    ResponseListener
    A contract for classes interested in Phaser Client-Server protocol command responses.
